relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
I've yet experienced any malicious foul play at CSU.
Due to my at home commitments (child), I'm unable to partake in clubs and activities.
CSU is an university for all age groups.
The newly remodel library is amazing.
Due to my age/maturity and being a single parent, I don't participate in the student life activities. However, based upon my fellow classmates, student life is pretty exciting.
The instructors I've had the privilege to obtain knowledge from were definitely challenging.

The advise I offer potential students is to visit the campus to in order to get a feel of it. Afterall, selecting an educational institution is one of the most important decision one will make in their life.
CSU is an affordable university. The guidance counselors and instructors I've encountered with are awesome. The relationships I'd established with former classmates were a blessing.

textAfterTable: Juan from Chicago, IL 01/30/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 7 out of 7 people found this review useful. 3 of 44 Categories Comments Campus Safety safety is one of the top priorities at chicago state university. be ensured that the students and staff are always in good hands with the fine men and women from the illinois state police depatrment stationed on campus. Bang for the buck chicago state university exceeds expectations. student life at chicago state university will open your eyes to culture, ideas, and better life choices. What to do for fun a student can choose from a number of clubs and societies to join. the recreation center is always a hit for any athlete. the clubs at chicago state university organize events, concerts, and luncheons.
